## Projection.groundDistance() method

Returns the signed distance between the given coordinates and the closest point on the surface.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
abstract groundDistance(worldPoint: Vector3Like): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  worldPoint | [Vector3Like](./harp-geoutils.vector3like.md) | The position in world coordinates. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
